caption: Food was great! Had an issue with something on my order tried to speak with the manager Johnathan but the management was horrible, he lacked customer service skills and left my issue unresolved

Food was GREAT! Our reservations went as planned. The owner came to say hello & everyone was really nice. The Long Island was ON POINT. (Coming from a former bartender) Pre-teen friendly restaurant & I had a baby with us as well. Thanks! We will be back! (without the kids for date night!🤣

Me and my sister went to have lunch at this place on a very busy Sunday. She ordered 5 wings and the crab fries which looked fantastic. I ordered the Fried rice combo which came in a very small portion with hushpuppies that are a dollar a piece that came out cold plus the sweetest coleslaw I've ever had in my life. Our reservation was at 4pm we  didn't get our food until a hour and 30 min later. We were put at a table by the bar that rocked back and forth like a see saw. The manager saw this and said not one word but was quick to replace a chair missing a piece on the leg at the table next to us meanwhile my red drink just rocked right off the table onto my brand new all white shoes and he never said a word. Didn't care about our experience and displayed no concern what so ever. The food was great not enough but still great the prices are ok in some areas and excessive in others. Our waitress was at least amazing but this was not a great first experience  for us.

I ordered online (from the H st location) a Mukbang bowl the Lil Boss with a side of crawfish . My crawfish were not fully cooked, I eat CRAWFISH often and the crawfish were feathery, mushy and extra dirty. The lobster tail was OVER cooked or were frozen . Even the sausage wasn’t cooked all the way  The crab legs were perfect and all my extras (potato, corn, egg and broccoli ) were just OK. It was later in the evening around 6pm and busy maybe the people cooking food was tired and ready to go. I MIGHT try this place again and eat in. Oh, the 2 hostess at the door (on 3/21/21) were super nice and sweet .I’m a New Englander and I know and LOVE seafood, they need a little bit more practice. Like I said I will try again and eat in at an earlier time maybe things will be better. BUT, try the place yourself, everyone has different taste.

I really enjoyed my time here and the atmosphere with my friends of over 30 years.  The food was amazing although it seemed very slow to come out. I also was a little put off by finding out once we were there that although we had made a reservation we had a time limit of 1 hour 30 mins. The drinks were good but the cups were very small. Overall we had an amazing time and I would definitely go again!
Food is the best!!!
Great atmosphere and great drinks, wait times was a little slow, but the food was very good.

I heard about this place from a friend of mines that lives in Maryland and swears that this is some of the best seafood in the area. Me being from Maryland and growing up cracking crabs and peeling shrimp since knee high I wanted to see what it was all about. I visited the the DC H street location with a few of my friends this past Saturday. We made a 4:30 reservation and we arrived at 4:50 because of DC traffic. We where told by the host at the front door that every reservation has a 10 minute grace period and that our table had been given away and that we would have to go on the waitlist to get a table which would probably be about two hours. I requested to speak with the manager (His name was Johnathan) he came and spoke with us and was very professional. He made accommodations and had us seated in 10 minutes. I ordered the Cajun pasta and I also ordered the Lil Boss Mukbang Bowl. When I tell you the seafood was some of the best I’ve ever had!!! The flavors and spices where amazing! I highly recommend this place to all true seafood lovers!!

If you love shrimp crabs or any seafood don’t come here.. Pictures are for comparison ,  $20 cocktails served in 8oz cups  Seafood fried rice is dry and came with frozen tiny shrimp and in a “side” sized portion Seafood Mac n cheese over cooked , basically mash potatoes and also side sized portion For $18 each I’d rather pay $20 somewhere else.  Pound of shrimp was extremely over cooked waited and hour and got it in a watery flavorless sauce.  Never again. Go to chasing tails or crafty crab or sea boil crab If you’ve been here and given this place over a 2 star you don’t know what seafood should taste like, if you haven’t been here and like seafood go somewhere else..

Enter at your own risk! Horrible Horrible customer service, nothing to drink in the restaurant, no soda no beer. Never received my food while others at my table got theirs. So unprofessional. Staff seems so lost. I hope they can get it together so we can enjoy our black owned business!
This place is terrible. We waited for our food for over 40 minutes to get this food? The food came cold. The seafood Mac and cheese. Really... just 3 shrimp for this price?  This place is a scam

Let me start by apologizing upfront for not uploading photographs. Photographs will not do this meal any justice. OK... I could not stop from devouring this beautifully seasoned perfection to stop for photos.  There is nothing little of the Lil' Boss!!!  The Crab Boss ...where do I begin!  This is the NEW GOLD standard of flavour! Your taste buds will THANK YOU! Take the time to learn about the inspirational story behind Mr. Lenell Watson, originally from Florida, bringing you this mastery. Sorry Florida,  he belongs to the DMV now.  The next time you are in Brandywine or Washington DC stop by and be sure to thank him for awakening your taste buds. #crabboss

Staff answering the phone is incredibly rude and unhelpful. Should not be working in customer service if you do not have proper people/ communication skills. Very shameful, do better ! Would not even get food from here considering how rude the staff is via phone.

Very unorganized and unprofessional! Ordered online and was waiting 1 hour and 30 mins. My ticket said my food would ready in 40 mins. My friend and bunch of other people are standing here waiting for our food with no estimate on when it will be finished! I’m all for supporting Black Business’ but Customer Service and a professional staff are priceless! #neveragain

Freezing cold! They have the AC running. Quality of food has declined each time I have visited. Maybe the food will be fresh during the warmer months but right now, not the best. However, they are very accommodating,  everyone is always nice... I will give them one more try when it gets warmer.

Got this recommendation from 2 different accounts on Tik Tok. The food is amazing, the service is quick and convenient. The staff is super friendly and the atmosphere is welcoming, energetic and yet, relaxed enough for a family evening. I give this a solid 8/10. My only thing is, the seafood mac and cheese we ordered, the shrimp wasn't very well seasoned. Otherwise, I loved it.
Food is basic Service is terrible Don't waste your money Better places to eat in DC

The food was pretty good probably would have been better if we got everything we ordered. The staff was nice but very unorganized. We order several items that we never received but otherwise it was an ok experience I doubt I would revisit.

Food was delicious, service was horrible! We had rooftop reservations and arrived early. We were told they did not have rooftop availability despite our reservation, and we had to wait over a half hour to be seated. Then when we were finally seated, the server neglected to enter the birthday girl's order and had to be reminded three times before doing so. Our cocktails did not arrive until the entree was nearly finished, there were no water refills and the server appeared to be overwhelmed and therefore she was not very attentive to our table. One person in my party did not receive an ordered item and the server asked nonchalantly if he even still wanted it. I was actually shocked at this experience due to Mr. Crab Boss himself being present and things still operating so poorly. We chose to celebrate my friend's milestone 40th bday at this Black owned restaurant and we regretted it. We were trying to extend a second chance as we also had bad service during our first visit but this time was 10 times worst.
It was very nice I enjoyed myself with some friends
The catfish was fried to perfection! The service was excellent. Drinks are a bit overpriced.

Horrible wait times and service! Placed an online order that stated I would be able to pick my order up at a certain time— arrive to the establishment and waited an additional hour for the order. I drove 1 hour and 45 minutes for horrible service. I could have flew to Florida in the time I waited for my order. When I called in to question the website/wait time discrepancy, the young lady laughed at the fact that they were behind and the website was grossly inaccurate— per her words “I don’t know what you want me to tell you”.  When we received our food at 11pm (order placed at 9pm, order was supposed to be done by 10pm) extra items we ordered and paid for were MISSING, food was cold and one of my crab legs were empty. There was no way I was going to ask for my extra items because waiting any longer was unimaginable— so we chalked the loss and left.  I went to the Brandywine location a few years back and had a good experience— but because of this H street experience, I will take my business elsewhere.. $100 wasted.
It was nice & the food was great
Small portions 3 legs means actually 3 legs not clusters

The customer service is the worst I've ever experienced IN MY LIFE!!!! The environment is equivalent to a high school cafeteria. The manager Jonathan...and to call him that puts a bad taste in my mouth, who the hell interviewed and hired this guy, is rude and he got me high just from talking to him. Skip the headache and eat somewhere else!!!!
It was comfortable, the manager was open and honest, and professional.
Customer Service is 100%
Food was amazing!! I got fried rice, crab fries and a mukbang bowl.. everything was good! Veggies a lil spicy but hey some ppl like it that way! I will be back!

This is my first time leaving a review for anything. This speaks volume for me because I honestly dont care enough to post reviews for anything. Tonight’s service had me so heated, I NEEDED to leave a review. If I could give half a star I really would. I work in the food industry and know what its like when it gets busy and how to tend to customers even in our busy time frames. Upon arrival, I was initially told the wait would be no longer than 30mins, so me and my friend go for a stroll while waiting for a text. After 35mins or so pass, no text. We decide to go back to Crab Boss to check in and see whats going on. Multiple staff members and hosts pass by as well as other guests, no acknowledgment. After 20 or so minutes of waiting, the same host who initially came out to add us to the wait list asks if we had a reservation. We clarify that we had already been put on the wait list over 40mins ago. The same host then seats a couple that comes after us stating they “had a reservation” so the table that was set for us was just taken by them. My friend and I are understanding and decide well, its alright we can wait. Another 15mins or so passes and we are finally seated after waiting a little over an hour. As we sit, the area is still wet from cleaning products that smell as if the rags used have not been rotated or clean. We had one fill of water and no waiter comes to the table after 20mins or so.No waiter served us the entire time we dined here. I get up, walk over to the bar and ask a gentleman who was kind enough to let us know he was not our server but was able to place our order. We waited for another hour for our food to come out. Within the hour we waited, there was no service provided. No refill on our water was provided. When our food arrived I was so shocked to see a small basket for 22$ with 3 small crab legs, shrimp, small corn, and 3 little balls of hush puppies.. blew my mind that it took a whole hour to prepare this dish. My friends food came out and it was cold. I will say the food was delicious especially the crab fries, that is what made the meal good. The service was definitely horrible, even if your are a busy establishment and with all the staff that was seen catering to other customers and seeing if they were alright none were present at our table. After we finished our food, we thought we’d give the establishment the benefit of the doubt and wait for our checks. 15mins later, I walked to the bar to ask for our check. Upon leaving, then and only then did two gentleman speak to us with customer service. This establishment did not have good service, their food was good but not worth the bad service given.
I love the new spot in D.C.! Same great food as in Brandywine! Everything was AMAZING as usual!  Can't wait until they bring the fried Lobster bites back!

Best in the region. I went the night before to order in person but they closed at 8:30pm. Went the next night and it was definitely worth the wait. The key is the sauce and they got it right.  Other places typically don’t put much effort in the sauce; mainly buttered old bay or that other nonsense to add to high blood pressure. Crab Sauce is not some seasonings with just butter; your sauce should be well blended with no granular traces. Crab Boss has given crab sauce dignity again😊 Nothing was watery or discolored in my Lil Boss combo.  The shrimp was a generous size and very fresh.  The sausage was different, generous portion, and had a nice kick. You could tell the sausage wasn’t that processed like kielbasa is. I prefer the small red potatoes however you won’t complain about not having enough potatoes.  The potato is basically half of a baked potato.  The corn was excellent; it didn’t taste like it sat in water all day long.  The crab legs were a nice size and meaty.  You must order the Scallop Rockefeller; especially if you’re not an oyster person.  All in all this is how a good low country boil should taste and be enjoyed with friends 🥰👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾 P.S. Please move to an ADA accessible location; I don’t mind the steps but my Senior isn’t going to make it.
Always excellent.
Excellent
Food and service was very good. Good portions of food for the money. No oysters when I went but I was very pleased
very disappointed way different than what he's known for which is his delicious pull ups
Great decor, and atmosphere. Manager John is their crown gem.
Good Name bad food unorganized poor customer service
I enjoyed the experience! The only negative thing I would say is I wish they had options of cajun or regular seasoning.
Good flavor however, very skimpy presentation of food. For a place with the name crab, doesn't have many crab options which was disappointing.
great restaurant , affordable prices and tasty food . I get the same thing everytime i visit which is half shrimp combo. Never disappoints and food comes out in a fast paced manner !

Food awful... Staff young and unprofessional... Ordered a lemon drop... (Adult beverage) i think the toung lady made the drink with concentrated straight lemon juice awful... Young lady went from standing at bar to behind bar... Did not wash her hands. 3 stars because I get tge owner hiring young black students....
First time visitor.  The wait time is the only negative.  Overall delicious seafood mac and cheese! DC has set the tone with great, authentic seafood dishes. Vegas CANNOT compete.

I have been disappointed by this restaurant twice. The first time the customer service was trash. Gave it another chance only because my family member said this has never happened before. Try it again...same thing. We made a reservation and I notice that there are no tables that will accommodate our party. The hostess sees this as well & says I’ll be right back. The manager rudely comes up to us & says I can’t have y’all standing right here due to COVID they may shut us down. Ummm you’re right I shouldn’t be standing here because I made a reservation and should be at the table you all should have reserved when confirming my reservation. Seeing that we were all getting upset, they took our number down to call when a table was available. 10 minutes later we get a call that a table is available. Not only did it take an hour to receive crab legs... mine were cold & orders were messed up. Idk if it’s just this location or what but never will I be visiting this establishment again.
Great food
Great food,drinks,service,and it's a great restaurant.
Foid wasn't hot drinks were watered down

This place was overrated I had high hopes seeking for the down south season and portions but didn’t get either they only have 1 option for the kids menu and you could not substitute it for any else  so my daughter was forced to get an adult size order then on top of that I got extremely small portions of seafood and the $5 sausage I added on was disgusting 🤢 I would not recommend this place every time I asked the waitress for something on the menu the answer was “we don’t have it now” in my head I’m like what do you have smh they make you spend top  dollar on bad service and not great food never again
Way better than I was even expecting! Delicious, perfectly seasoned seafood!

This was the worst gumbo I’ve ever tasted. 2 pieces or small shrimp, crab, and no sausage and no chicken. Save your money and go somewhere else. This was my second time trying Crab Boss. Pictures look nice online but the food is bland and not worth it

Today was my birthday and I decided I wanted to order takeout. I ordered the same thing I had before which was the fried shrimp platter and it was good. However my youngest daughter ordered the seafood mac and cheese and it was horrible (it was very dry and there was hardly any cheese in it so she tossed it). She also ordered the catfish platter and she said that was good. My oldest daughter ordered the crab legs and lobster platter and the broccoli was basically raw which she said should only be in a salad so she wasn’t impressed either. My husband ordered the shrimp and crab cake platter and said it wasn’t really good at all. Lastly two drinks were ordered and when the order was picked up, no drinks were included. He had to go back to get the drinks and you would have thought something free would have been given to him because he had to go back but nothing was offered. All in all it was my birthday and I was very disappointed because I chose the restaurant. I feel what keeps people coming back to a restaurant is the great food and the exceptional customer service. I feel like the mark was missed today!!!
They excluded part of my order, and failed to offer an apology when I went back to pick it up.  The food is okay, the customer service is lacking.
Very flavorful! The music and vibe was nice as well. I really enjoyed it
Too much crab and too much fun. Any problem with that? Not if you can get back down the stairs in one piece. Go there and you'll know what I'm talking about.
Food was excellent
Food was good and atmosphere was kool.

I visited Crab Boss on Saturday October 24th on H street for the first time. I must say my first impression was good, I was greeted by a very well mannered young man by the name Jason.  He was so attentive and knowledgeable.  Since it was my first time I ordered several different dishes, I had seafood mac n cheese, Po-boy meal with shrimp, and seafood fries. Everything was delicious.
Atmosphere as expected for COVID-19 times.  Boss fries and Boss Oysters hit the spot right on the money. But the full mukbang was lacklustful compared to other locations.

I JUST SPENT OVER $120.00 FOR MY FOOD THAT WAS DELIVERED.. THE SAUSAGE, MY CRAB CAKE AND HUSH PUPPIES WERE MISSING AND THEY HAD THE NERVE TO ASK IF WANT TO COME GET IT OR DO WE WANT REFUND. DIDNT NEED NOTHING EXTRA BUT THEY COULD HAVE BROUGHT US OUR FOOD DUE TO THERE MESS UP.

Sent for a lunch dat we and we had a great time. The food was a little salty but otherwise we enjoyed everything. The atmosphere is real lively and the music is great ! We would definitely be returning
Staff was great and food was good.

Food was great! Well seasoned and tasty. I had the crab and shrimp combo and the Boss Up drink, was awesome. My waiter was really cool, attentivex and super likeable. He gets 5 stars! I received great quick service on Saturday evening.
Good food and good service!

We went to the roof . Beautiful view . The place is def overhyped tho . The seafood fried rice was a small bowl with mostly rice with a couple of shrimps and very little lump crab .  The frozen drink machine was inoperable . That was disappointing. Service wasn’t exceptionally fast either.
The seafood was scrumptious especially the oyster rockafellar and  seafood macaroni! The rooftop seating was socially distance for all, but the alcoholic drinks were less than desirable.

The Lil boss platter is way too overpriced for the value you get for a seafood boil.  This is what happens when restaurants in DC are forced to overpriced just to make the restaurant sustainable.  Service also is not the best. Food takes too long to come out and waiters don't pay attention to details
Great service and food!!
Nice place to have big crabs.
Food was good. Cool atmosphere. Great staff! Will definitely go back!
great service, good food great atmosphere bomb drinks!!.
Food was ok. Instead of showing a pic of just the sign in the hallway, show all the steps you have to walk up before even being seated.  Not handicap friendly.

Went here for a friends birthday gathering recently and it was definitely worth the trip. The Boss Fries are a must. I indulged in the  Half Bowl and the seasoning was on point. Some of the best seafood I’ve had in DC. Hallelu 🙌🏿 The owner was super friendly, the staff was masked & sanitized, and the food was delicious. I would definitely visit again.
Convenient off street parking, nice music, beautiful atmosphere,  great food drinks and courteous  staff

I have been following this man for years and FINALLY got to come to his restaurant. AMAZING food. AMAZING service. AMAZING view. AMAZING drinks. I’m visiting from Dallas for my birthday and coming to Crab Boss H street was an excellent way for me to start my trip. My reservation was less than two hours from landing on my plane. Best part? THE crab BOSS with the sauce showed up!! Got to meet this inspiring man and try his incredible food.
The only reason why I giving 4 stardSefood was fresh
All Good! Ordering,Speed,Food,Service, and Safety...All Good!

Our order was missing $60 worth of food and we have been unable to get any response from the restaurant despite calling immediately (no answer) and multiple times thereafter (someone will call you back) and submitting online forms (no response). I really hesitated to make this review because I fully understand times are hard for restaurants, but this is not acceptable and not a trivial amount of money/food. I will say that the food that we did receive was good, but I would not order again because of this situation.

The food is decent the crab fries is a overload of alfredo thats all you taste .And if you plan on getting your food delivered be prepared to have something missing. I will no longer support this business two reason why, the second time i placed a order my hush puppies were missing , the last time i ordered was two weeks ago got my food delivered and my seafood mac n cheese was missing . The owner tried to explain to me that it was my fault the mac n cheeze was missing , insinuating that i was lying from the start.maybe the service is better if you dine in

I did not have a good experience at this location. I ordered food for delivery and only received part of my order. I called and left 2 messages and also spoke with an employee regarding my missing items. The employee had an attitude when I asked to speak to a Supervisor and stated a Supervisor would call me back that same day. No one called me back about my missing food items. Additionally, the food I received was cold and was missing the sauce that should've been on the crab legs. I say save your money and maybe try the other location if you can. This location was simply not professional and the food quality was below average.
This is the place to come if you want DELICIOUS food and phenomenal service!!

Amazing service and they are very clean. Nothing came out cold or undercooked. All of the food was seasoned just enough without being overwhelming. They also honor military discount. Highly recommend.

Wonderful experience with friends! Rooftop is amazing, exceptional customer service, owner is super cool and friendly, he loves to greet his customers and have conversations with them! Food was seasoned well and delicious! But what stood out the most to me was the customer service! Will definitely be going back!
Nice atmosphere
Service was amazing food was great. Recommend you reserve seating before you go. Boss 🍟 is on point.

I had such high hopes for this place. But I was very disappointed. I had made reservations for the rooftop and upon arrival, I was told that they overbooked so we couldn't sit on the rooftop. It took a very long time for our server to come to our table initially. And once we put our orders in, we had to wait over an hour for our food to be brought out. And when it was brought out, two of our orders were wrong. And the waitress never really checked on us to see if we wanted anything else to drink or anything while we waited for our food. They were very lax with people wearing their mask correctly or at all with both customers and employees. The only saving grace was the food and drinks. And someone from the kitchen brought us out free shrimp for the wait. Other than that, this place was a total let down. I even felt like the owner's apology was just lip service. It didn't feel genuine at all. Particularly because he gave the same exact speech to the table next to us. You come to a restaurant for the ambiance and the experience. And we just didn't get that on this visit. If I ever feel like having Crab Boss again, I'll just go to their MD location for take out and eat at home.

Im surprised the restaurant is called "Crab Boss" it's is giving "Crab Assistant!" at best.   I ordered 2 crab cake platters, broiled oysters and crab fries with extra crab (for 7 more dollars) and I must say I am UNIMPRESSED!  I was expecting the crab cakes to be prepared MD styles with less filler. After eating some of what I had,  I would never suggest anyone order the crab cakes as a sandwich because eating it as is supplies enough filler (very bread-y).  In my opinion the crab fries were just okay.. the "alfredo" sauce is powdery tasting and I'm still searching for the crab amongst the sea of soggy sauce drenched french fries.  If y'all want delicious CRABBY-crab fries go to "Be Claws" in Hyattsville they've got it down pat!  Lastly the oysters were okay but the amount of cheese used was a bit off putting.  This oyster experience reminded me to NEVER trust a charbroiled oyster outside of NOLA!!  The hush puppies were good though.  All- in-all everyone has different taste, for me Crab boss missed the mark. I'd only eat it again if someone was to treat me, but give it a try for yourself these are just my thoughts.
Amazing atmosphere , food and service

Slow wait times. Bad customer. Unclean atmosphere. Waitresses were very unprofessional. They asked everyone with a reservation to wait outside on the street even though it was our reservation time. We showed up early they said it would take 15-20 mins to bus our table but 30 mins later the table was still not ready. Then another waitress comes outside stating “the kitchen is swamped. Even customers who are seated are waiting on their order.” She then told us that we should probably leave unless we plan on waiting another 45 mins. The owner also came outside but not to acknowledge or address our concerns. Instead to take an old broom and use it to knock the cobb webs off the side of the restaurant awning. Overall bad experience. This place needs better management and needs to stop reservations until they can get the kitchen under control.
The rooftop was awesome. My waitress was very friendly. The food was inexpensive and delicious!

Today was my first experience here the pickup orders from the locker is a good idea....I did a takeout order Seafood Mac&Cheese and Lobster Tails....Mac&Cheese was dry only 3 shrimp wasn't what I expected at all
The food and service was awesome will be going back
Worth the money
The food was delicious 😋 We came from 3 different states

Our waiter was not attentive. We got boxes before we got the Boss sauce. He forgot drinks, sauce, etc.  It was my bday so the owner came over and wished me a happy bday. It was a great exp, despite lackluster service.
It's okay.
Came here for a friends birthday the food was delicious and the drinks were bomb... they were not selfish with the alcohol. Going back in a couple weeks for another friends birthday.
Amazing customer service
Some of THE best seafood I've had in a while.

Ordered the crab platter for takeout. Got home and realized the sweet corn was missing. Called them at 7:30 and no answer--left message. 2 more calls were not answered. I understand mistakes--but you have to make it right--and how do you not even answer the phone? Very disappointing.

Great customer service, great food, great vibes and there's rooftop with outdoor seating and a bar with frozen drinks. When I was there on a Sunday at 12:30 it was not very crowded, my party of 2 received our food in less than 10 mins after ordering and the owner of the restaurant even came to check on us and see how everything was.
Love it.  Going back again.

I had such an amazing experience!! Went to the Hst location! Staff was friendly and our server John was AMAZING!!! Sat on the rooftop! Overall beautiful beautiful restaurant!! The food is amazing! Very satisfied with my experience! Highly recommended!!
Yummy and great experience
I will give a better rating if I was able to get a table and then trying to book a table for two weeks now it's either no room or the the booking process malfunction
Food was phenomenal, and my waiter Aaron was everything. His amazing personality is infectious.
Atmosphere was really good! Food was bomb! Server was on point! Will be going back!

The food was great,  the vibe was good staff was pleasant, it was so hot on the day we went at 98 degrees,  and limited seating on the roof, but once we moved to a covered portion of the roof it was better.

Had a great experience at the H street location. Awesome customer service! Owner came by table and spoke to everyone and made sure ppl were enjoying their food. Very friendly staff. Drinks were really good (will def be back for those) and the crabs and shrimp w/ boss sauce was so good I wish I had taken to go! Will be back soon.

Place a Togo order that went missing didn’t receive my food until close/around 9 (was suppose to be ready 8:20) lost my appetite. Ended up not even eating it and giving it away. Wont be back, another black owned business I will not be supporting.
Taste amazing
Great food , Great Service
Yeah its str8 all love
Great spot, friendly staff and most importantly good food. Entire staff was masked up and seating was socially distance friendly.
Great food and great drinks. The staff is outstanding as well

Crab boss NEVER disappoints. I have been waiting for this place to open since the day I saw the sign. I have been supporting the Brandywine location for years but now I can go up the street in DC. Anyway since it's a soft opening I don't think the full menu was available but the options are Still good. The owner is the nicest. I don't know what the post someone said he was rude was talking about. Anyway, if you can come through. It's great.
Y’all need to fix the time on your website for the dc location. It clearly say 12pm
Excellent service and food.  I purchased the seafood Mac and cheese, boss fries and the fried whiting platter.  It was absolutely delicious.  Thanks Crab Boss I will be returning.

Wow, Crab Boss exceeded all expectations! I have heard that Crab Boss is a Maryland gem, so I was excited when I heard they were coming to DC. Their beautiful rooftop is a close second to their food. I got the Half Boss while my wife got the catfish plate and we shared a Seafood Mac & Cheese. All of it was savory and delicious. The cherry on top was the friendly staff and great drinks. Since only the rooftop is open, we look forward to seeing the rest of the restaurant when it opens. I can already see this being the new hot H street spot. Thanks Crab Boss!

The Owner has a horrible attitude and demeanor the staff was extremely helpful and very pleasant they made my experience soo good until I had to encounter the owner very rude  and nasty attitude for no reason.Its truly sad when you try patronizing your own this is a smack in the face because before you had this establishment on h st I have tried to support you smh but thanks a lot for being a reminder to why we continue to support others. We are all paying the same prices so why should we be treated differently.
